detectors.description:

	Dangerous comparisons:

detectors.description:
MakerDaoOracleProxy.getPrice(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MakerDaoOracleProxy.sol#129-147) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- uint256(value) * (10 ** (18 - decimals)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MakerDaoOracleProxy.sol#142)
	- require(bool,string)(block.number - sparePriceBlockNumber <= 3600,ORACLE_OFFLINE) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MakerDaoOracleProxy.sol#144)
